132.movie_plot: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

155.movie_plot: Benji is left in the wilderness after an accident. Can he survive?

147.movie_name: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972)
147.movie_plot: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

140.movie_plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

119.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

151.movie_plot: Prequel to the first Missing In Action, set in the early 1980s it shows the capture of Colonel Braddock during the Vietnam war in the 1970s, and his captivity with other American POWs in a brutal prison camp, and his plans to escape.

153.movie_plot: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

118.movie_plot: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. Léon and Mathilda form an unusual relationship, as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

138.movie_plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

137.movie_plot: An All-American trucker gets dragged into a centuries-old mystical battle in Chinatown.

139.movie_plot: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

123.movie_plot: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

128.movie_plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

125.movie_plot: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

141.movie_plot: Former Green Beret John Rambo is pursued into the mountains surrounding a small town by a tyrannical sheriff and his deputies, forcing him to survive using his combat skills.

127.movie_plot: A vengeful woman sets out to retrieve a magic orb from an evil queen whom she vows vengeance upon after the evil queen slain her family and her loyal warriors raped her.

121.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
121.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

122.movie_plot: The adventures of Superman's cousin in her own superhero career.

135.movie_plot: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

129.movie_plot: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

134.movie_plot: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

144.movie_plot: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

124.movie_plot: An barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.

150.movie_plot: A weekly Saturday (later Sunday) Morning repackaged compilation with new wraparounds featuring two Tom and Jerry cartoons sandwiching other MGM animated theatrical shorts.

136.movie_plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

133.movie_plot: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

152.movie_plot: Braddock mounts a one-man assault to free his wife and son who are still being held in a Vietnam prison camp.

120.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

146.movie_name: Battle for the Planet of the Apes (1973)
146.movie_plot: One decade after a worldwide series of ape revolutions and a brutal nuclear war among humans, Caesar must protect survivors of both species from an insidious human cult and a militant ape faction alike.

154.movie_plot: Colonel Braddock launches a mission deep into the jungles of Vietnam to find the POW camp that he escaped from and free the Americans still held captive there.

148.movie_plot: The angel Gabriel comes to Earth to collect a soul which will end the stalemated war in Heaven, and only a former priest and a little girl can stop him.

143.movie_plot: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

142.movie_name: Homeward Bound II: Lost in San Francisco (1996)
142.movie_plot: Shadow, Sassy, and Chance have to find their way home after they become stranded at the San Francisco International Airport as their owners fly to Canada on vacation.

149.movie_plot: Philippe Delambre, the now-adult son of "The Fly", does some transportation experimentation of his own.

130.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

145.movie_plot: The almost-human son of "Brundlefly" searches for a cure to his mutated genes while being monitored by a nefarious corporation that wishes to continue his father's experiments.

117.movie_plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

126.movie_plot: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

131.movie_plot: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a C.I.A. Agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

50.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

12.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
12.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

63.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

82.movie_plot: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

104.movie_name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes (1970)
104.movie_plot: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

41.movie_plot: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

79.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

2.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

53.movie_plot: A gentle man, with scissors for hands, is brought into a new community after living in isolation.

49.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

21.movie_plot: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

92.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

26.movie_plot: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

18.movie_plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

97.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

22.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

34.movie_plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

73.movie_plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

28.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

44.movie_plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

55.movie_plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

0.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

114.movie_plot: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

113.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

61.movie_plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

9.movie_plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

66.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

72.movie_plot: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

56.movie_plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

69.movie_plot: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

6.movie_plot: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

52.movie_plot: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

16.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

14.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
14.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

43.movie_plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

11.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

90.movie_plot: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

45.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
45.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

78.movie_plot: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

110.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

99.movie_plot: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

106.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

96.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.

38.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

35.movie_plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

10.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

7.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
7.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

112.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

70.movie_plot: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

81.movie_plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

85.movie_plot: A man, having fallen in love with the wrong woman, is sent by the sultan himself on a diplomatic mission to a distant land as an ambassador. Stopping at a Viking village port to restock on supplies, he finds himself unwittingly embroiled on a quest to banish a mysterious threat in a distant Viking land.

77.movie_plot: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

62.movie_plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

23.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
23.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

102.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

103.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

75.movie_plot: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

76.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

115.movie_plot: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

46.movie_name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail (1974)
46.movie_plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

39.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

105.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

36.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
36.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

101.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
101.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

1.movie_plot: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

83.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
83.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

4.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

20.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

111.movie_plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

29.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

91.movie_plot: When Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip along the Nile, her boyfriend, Jack Colton, and pal Ralph rush to rescue her and retrieve a fabled jewel.

84.movie_plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

87.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

25.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
25.movie_plot: After the rebels are overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda. His friends accept shelter from a questionable ally as Darth Vader hunts them in a plan to capture Luke.

30.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

3.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

32.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

40.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

48.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

64.movie_plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

88.movie_plot: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

68.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

37.movie_plot: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.

74.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

31.movie_plot: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

98.movie_plot: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient valuable treasure.

71.movie_plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

100.movie_plot: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

93.movie_plot: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

33.movie_plot: A young thief, seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who also pursues vengeance of his own.

19.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

47.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

5.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

80.movie_plot: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

51.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

27.movie_plot: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

13.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

8.movie_plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

95.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

42.movie_plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

60.movie_plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

108.movie_plot: Cartoonist Woody becomes the superhero he draws. Using his gadgets he helps a Soviet spy defect to the West.

67.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

54.movie_plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

24.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

59.movie_plot: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

94.movie_plot: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

58.movie_plot: Embarrassed by his large nose, a romantic poet/soldier romances his cousin by proxy.

89.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

86.movie_plot: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

15.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

17.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

116.movie_plot: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

57.movie_plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

109.movie_name: Darby O'Gill and the Little People (1959)
109.movie_plot: A wily old codger matches wits with the king of the leprechauns and helps play matchmaker for his daughter and the strapping lad who has replaced him as caretaker.

107.movie_plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.
